source_objects.title: Influence
source_objects.description: From negotiation tactics to communication strategies, winning friends to persuading colleagues, learn how to most effectively make an impact with these courses on influence.

items.title: Storytelling to Influence

visible_instructors.title: Jeff Tan
visible_instructors.name: Jeff
visible_instructors.job_title: Making It Happen as a Learning Innovator, Coach, & Speaker

items.headline: How to use stories to influence decision makers in the audience!
objectives_summary: FIND new stories easily to add impact and emphasis to your message
PRESENT your message clearly
LEAD your audience step-by-step

items.title: Successful Negotiation: Master Your Negotiating Skills
items.headline: Master negotiation with these negotiating tips
objectives_summary: Negotiate effectively and fairly to make 1000s more than they would otherwise
Be confident in starting and finishing a negotiation
Use smart tactics to increase their bargaining power

items.title: Radiate Confidence: How to Create a 1000 Watt Presence
items.headline: Helping you unlock your inner light, or presence, so you can easily, effortlessly connect with everyone you meet.
objectives_summary: Create a dynamic, expressive persona that radiates authenticity.
Connect to the power of positive thoughts to build confidence.
Tame the voices of doubt that have blocked you in the past.

items.title: Assertiveness Basics: The 50-minute Communication Guide

visible_instructors.title: Dr. Roy Naraine
visible_instructors.name: Dr. Roy
visible_instructors.job_title: Medical Doctor, Coach, Award Winning Instructor

items.headline: Communication Skills. Confidence. Body Language. Stress Management. Social Dynamics. Personal Development.
objectives_summary: Massively enhance your assertiveness
Boost your confidence & self-esteem
Manage stress

items.title: 2021 Complete Public Speaking Masterclass For Every Occasion
items.headline: TJ Walker's Incredibly Thorough and Comprehensive Public Speaking Course for Every Situation, Audience and Skill Level
objectives_summary: Look comfortable, confident and relaxed in any speaking situation
Speak in a clear and understandable manner
Speak in a memorable way (this is the hardest for most people)

items.title: Communication Skills Machine: Master Persuasion & Influence
items.headline: Learn the Communication Skills to Master the Secrets of Persuasion, Influence, & Assertiveness for Business & Life.
objectives_summary: Students will learn how to authentically make a great first impression and get anyone to like them within the first 5 seconds
The most effective method to pitch your product, service, or idea that will get almost anyone to say “Yes!”
The core foundations world class performers and companies use to develop their communication skills to become more persuasive in leadership roles

items.title: CONFIDENCE and SELF ESTEEM: Develop Confident Body Language

visible_instructors.title: Jimmy Naraine Support
visible_instructors.name: Jimmy Naraine
visible_instructors.job_title: Winner of Udemy Innovation Award teaching 223,000+ people

items.headline: Learn how to feel and look more CONFIDENT & COMFORTABLE with proven body language tools. TOP-Rated body language course
objectives_summary: Learn how to engineer a confident body language
Body Language in the times of Covid19
Learn how to feel more comfortable in your own skin

items.title: Persuasion Masterclass: How To Powerfully Influence Anyone

visible_instructors.title: Insider School
visible_instructors.name: Insider
visible_instructors.job_title: Change Your Life In 5 Minutes A Day

items.headline: Master The 3 Hidden Skills of the Most Persuasive People Without Manipulation In 10 Minutes A Day …Guaranteed!
objectives_summary: 1. By the end of this course, you will be able to powerfully move others to action
2. You will master the 7 personality traits of the most powerful persuaders use to persuade others
3. You will learn the "Insider Persuasion Questions" to ask yourself before any important conversation

items.title: Influence People with Persuasion Psychology
items.headline: Better Marketing and Personal Success with Behavioral Science and the Psychology of Influence and Persuasion
objectives_summary: Get people to say "yes" more often
Understand the underlying psychological principles of influence
Develop your own strategies to influence other people's behavior

items.title: Voice Training – 30-Days to a More Confident Powerful Voice.

visible_instructors.title: Voiceover Masterclass
visible_instructors.name: Voiceover
visible_instructors.job_title: Voice Training for Absolute Beginners to Advanced Mastery!

items.headline: A complete 30-day voice training plan & simple vocal exercises you can follow each day to totally transform your voice!
objectives_summary: Within only 30 days from now you will have a voice that sounds rich, confident and more authoritative.
You will be able to retain your viewers attention and keep them more engaged.
You will be able to create videos that connect with your viewers and force them to take action.

items.title: Pitch Yourself! Learn to Ignite Curiosity + Inspire Action.
items.headline: Learn to speak about your work with clarity, ease and authenticity.  Never fear the question, "What do you do?" again!

items.title: Complete Presentation Skills Masterclass for Every Occasion
items.headline: Presentation Skills - Public Speaking - Communication Skills - Storytelling Skills for Every Situation and Skill Level
objectives_summary: Use Presentation Skills to Communicate with Any Sized Audience
Present in A Confident Style and Manner
Present in A Clear and Understandable Way

items.title: Mastering your own communication: The fundamentals
items.headline: Giving you the fundamentals that will enable you to develop your own wonderful, unique and engaging communication style.
objectives_summary: At the end of the 'fundamental stage' students will understand how to become more credible and confident in their own communication.
Students will also learn some really simple techniques and tools that will enable them to develop their own communication style and build their own self-confidence.

items.title: Master Persuasion Psychology
items.headline: Unlock the Secrets of Persuasion from Behavioral Science and Learn How to Influence People's Opinions and Decisions
objectives_summary: Put together a compelling message that will effectively persuade an audience.
Understand when some techniques are persuasive and when they are not.
Know how to map out your message so that it is persuasive under the right circumstances and for the right audiences.

items.title: Double Your Assertiveness, Confidence & Communication Skills
items.headline: Boost Your Assertiveness, Social skills, Communication Skills, Social Confidence, Charisma, Self Esteem, Social Dynamics
objectives_summary: Deal With Conflicts
Communicate With Confidence And Charisma
Have An Assertive Body Language

items.title: Marketing and Manipulation: The Neuroscience of Shopping
items.headline: Discover how Neuromarketing plays with subconscious triggers to make us buy more. Learn how to become immune to it
objectives_summary: Understand the working of our subconscious mind
Recognize the many strategies used by marketers to influence our subconsciousness
have fun seeing through marketing tactics in ads, commercials and point of sales
